title: What does "taken for granted" mean? Could you provide an example?

og.title: What does "taken for granted" mean? Could you provide an example?
og.description:
Answer (1 of 51): “Taken for granted” means “I am pretty sure I will always have this”.

It means “I have become so used to this, I don’t even notice it or have a thoughtless sense that it happens automatically.”

In a relationship, it can mean a short burst of a lack of appreciation, such as “th...
